amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds in the bill from being used to employ unauthorized aliens.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit funds to be used to employ workers described in section 274A(h)(3) of the Immigration and Nationality Act (8 U.S.C. 1324a(h)(3)).

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A041) Agreed to by voice vote.
